channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: New York lawmakers propose a three-year pause on new data centers
item.description: Although the bill’s prospects are uncertain, New York is at least the sixth state to consider pausing construction of new data centers.

item.title: I test smart lights for a living, and these are my top 3 Philips Hue smart lights to brighten up any space
item.description: Give any room a glow-up and set the mood with these color-shifting smart lights.

item.title: Netflix’s Animated ‘Ghostbusters’ Movie Shows Signs of Life
item.description: A new writer has joined the 'Ghostbusters' franchise's first animated movie, which got announced nearly a whole decade ago.

item.title: Analogue unearths N64 prototype colors for its limited edition 3D console
item.description: Analogue is back with another hit of N64 nostalgia, but with colorways that are deep cuts for even the biggest Nintendo nerds. Analogue announced its latest run of limited edition versions of its 3D console, this time drawing inspiration from a batch of prototype colorways for the original N64 that were manufactured but never hit the market. Now, the Analogue 3D will come in Ghost, Glacier, Extreme Green, Ocean and yes, even Atomic Purple. It may just be a cosmetic upgrade, but it's worth noting that each of the colorways has matching cables, power adapters and 16GB SD cards that come preinsta...

item.title: Test de la LG S20A : et si la vraie barre de son « petit budget » ne venait pas d’un kit 5.1 ?
item.description: Avec son format ultra compact, son architecture 2.0 canaux et l’absence totale de caisson, la barre de son LG S20A promet de donner un second souffle aux petits téléviseurs sans transformer le salon en salle de cinéma pour un budget très raisonnable. Nous l’avons testée et en voici nos impressions.

item.title: I tested the Viltrox 35mm f/1.2 LAB for two months – photo assignments will never be the same again
item.description: Viltrox's priciest prime lens is optically incredible, versatile for documentary work, and costs a fraction of proprietary equivalents

item.title: Trump T1 smartphone re-emerges with new specs and higher price
item.description: The Trump T1 phone has been MIA for a while now, but in a new interview, it reappeared with a different look.
